summary:
This is Mod which adds Lokir of Rorikstead as follower. 
Lokir is relaxing at the inn of Rorikstead.
descriptionHtml:
I\\\\\\\'m sorry. 
I can seldom speak English. 

This is Mod which adds Lokir of Rorikstead as follower. 
Lokir is relaxing at the inn of Rorikstead.

The punch of Lokir is stronger than whom, and it is not sturdy rather than whom. 
It is the gamble of whether it pushes down or to be pushed down.
author: Mao
